channel.title: Bigquery schema not showing up
channel.description:
### Issue Summary Need help Just installed redash on VM GCP using Docker from cloning this repo https://github.com/getredash/setup.git, when I set up the connection to Bigquery it cannot show the schema. ![Screenshot 2023-01-04 at 20.08.31|690x377](upload://ptHnqCU6vpQiwvHRFZ8l6F9YTL5.png)
When i test connection it running well. Need help for this issue, thanks
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: redash:8.0.0.b32245 * Browser/OS: Chrome/Debian 10 Buster * How did you install Redash: Docker

item.title: Bigquery schema not showing up
item.dc:creator: rokuso
item.description:
Issue Summary

Need help
Just installed redash on VM GCP using Docker from cloning this repo GitHub - getredash/setup: Setup scripts for Redash Cloud Images, when I set up the connection to Bigquery it cannot show the schema.

When i test connection it running well.
Need help for this issue, thanks

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: redash:8.0.0.b32245
  • Browser/OS: Chrome/Debian 10 Buster
  • How did you install Redash: Docker

Read full topic
